feed.title: Capacity increases for the Bitcoin system.

entry.title: Capacity increases for the Bitcoin system.
entry.summary: In a message on the bitcoin-dev mailing list, Wladimir J. van der Laan mentioned that a Segwit testnet was expected later in December 2015, and would allow developers to test a linked implementation that was not yet completely finished. The discussion also included a reference to Testnet4.
